description: To extend existing hotel comprising a part 2/ part 3 storey and part 2/part 4 storey extension on top of the 1931 wings of the former Blind School, together with an infill extension in the rear courtyard incorporating part of the rear wing of the main Blind School building, involving the removal of part of its roof, together with the refurbishment and conversion of the first and second floors to create 12 additional hotel rooms, 26 aparthotel suites and ancillary accommodation (Use Class C1).
site_address: Hope Street Hotel and former School for the Blind, Hope Street and Hardman Street, Liverpool, L1 9BA
